Here is a small process to upgrade your Hotmail account from 25 MB to 250 MB.

1) Login ur hotmail account and go to options.
2) Go to "Personal"
3) Click "My Profile"
4) Change Country to "United States" Wait for browser to load United states settings.
5) Change the state to "Florida" and zip code "33332"
6) Click "Save"
7) Sign out
8) Sign in, now your account size will be 250 MB.
